name: Monster Island (itch) (Ben Yazi, danyclockworker)
description:
The island was taken over by a Monstree (tree monster). You are a brave sorcerer-alchemist who must defeat him and save the earth.

Grow plants to make potions against the monster.

If you do not have time to brew the potion correctly, the monster will destroy the piece of land. If successful, the monster will lose one of 6 lives.

CONTROLS:

  • WSAD - characters moving
  • "E" button - all characters actions:
    planting - put in one seed in ground
    harvesting - collect the grown product
    watering - add some water for improve growing
    It's depends on current state of selected ground tile.
  • 1-6 numbers or left click in inventory line - Choose plant type for planting.
  • Left click on bonus icon - Use bonus effect.

BONUSES: 

1. Freeze 

Freeze the recipe timer for 5 seconds.

2. Harvest 

Collect all plants on map.

3. Watering 

Watering all plants on map.
